p.strong: UPDATED PICK UP/DELIVERY TIMES FOR MEALS 3/27/20

li.p: "UPDATED INFORMATION" from Cardinal Community School District 3-20-20: *Please watch this video and refer to this document link.

ul.li: Destination Healthy Kids - An Emergency Youth Program providing free meal opportunities during the current health crisis.

a.strong: Message to Families from Mr. Pedersen

li.br: The Cardinal School District Food Service Staff is partnering with the Ottumwa YMCA to provide meals for children during this difficult time.

li.strong: Please direct any questions you may have concerning these difficult times to questions@cardinalcomet.com

div.p: Dear Families of Cardinal School District,
Cardinal School District Food Service Staff is partnering with the Ottumwa YMCA to provide meals for children that are in need during this difficult time.

Starting this Sunday, March 22nd from 1 pm to 3 pm Cardinal Food Service staff will be handing out a one week supply of packaged breakfast to every child ages 0-18. This will include a breakfast bar, fruit, and milk. This may be picked up drive-thru style at the high school kitchen, please see the attached directions for pick up. Please remain in your vehicles while picking up meals and supplies.

At this time we will also have a limited supply of other items such as toothbrushes, deodorant, and toilet paper to pass out to families in need through our Cardinal Cares program. If you are in need of something specific please contact heather.smith@cardinalcomet.com so we can see what we can do to help.

Starting Monday, March 23rd the YMCA will be dropping off and delivering lunch and dinner to locations within our district. Those locations and times are listed below. Please keep in mind that all meals must be taken home and consumed off-site in accordance with the Iowa Governor’s recommendations. If you are unable to make it to these locations please email Heather Smith at heather.smith@cardinalcomet.com and your family will be placed on a delivery list.
Our main focus at Cardinal School District is being able to provide our families with the essentials that they need during this time. If there is anything we can do to help please let us know.

div.p: Weekly breakfast pickup will be at the Cardinal High School Main Drive, Sundays, 1 pm to 3 pm.

p.strong: Ottumwa sites will be posted soon for easy access for our students in that area.

div.p: For food pick up, we ask that you follow these directions for pick up. Take the elementary entrance on HWY 16. Drive towards the back of the elementary building and follow the curved road traveling left by the football field and softball field. From here, you will take a left towards the high school. This longer loop will be one-way traffic and keep this pickup process as safe and quick as possible.

For your safety and ours we ask that you remain in your vehicle and do not park. A school staff member will come to your vehicle for the delivery near the black bus parked near the high school cafeteria.
